    Documentation

    Here you can find usage documentation and even documentation related to the VIP development process.

    • Prospectus
    • Feasibility
    • Sprint Reports
    • Documentation

    Prospectus

    The prospectus includes information such as the initial product backlog and a subset of the ACM Code of Ethics we believed to be particularly relevant to the project.

    Feasibility Study

    The feasibility study documents our experiments with various solutions to implementing VIP. It allowed us to estimate the amount of work we need to do to make VIP a reality.

    Sprint Reports

  • Sprint Report #1

    • Final Report

    The final report is the final document of this project. It helps giving an overview over developing process and provides a conclusion after completion.
